1520667301_12gAes6NzDS9E2q6Q1UXrpUdbPS6n.body: @krixano: Is it worth it to publish the incomplete translation? Translate "merger zites" into Russian is rather difficult (for me). It looks a little weird and "unnatural"...

[Russian, ver 0.1](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1MgHVPCE1ve6QfKrgsqCURzRj72HrRWioz/?1LWuc6JBhUGrKEAh1aPrPU85dEMcKmg3pS_4). I used "shared sites" instead of "merger" (like "shared objects" in GNU/Linux - same library used by many applications; in ZeroNet same database can be used by many "GUIs")
